channel.title: Need help picking source and client
channel.description: im searching for a source and a client that has not so much area to be on.. but i whant there to be wildy shops.. maby some mini games whoude also be nice. and i whant there to be use able bandos items gs's and other new items..skill capes.. any suggestions?

item.title: Need help picking source and client
item.dc:creator: @Xx_R_A_G_3_R Xx R A G 3 R
item.description:
@Xx_R_A_G_3_R wrote:

Icerealm V4 has a good gameframe, has added many client items, and his client comes with a tut on how 2 re-color items

Read full topic
